name: ynab-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for YNAB (You Need A Budget) integration. Provides 30 tools for comprehensive budget management, including delta-optimized data fetching, bulk transaction operations, advanced reconciliation with recommendations, split transaction support, and diagnostic utilities.

YNAB_ACCESS_TOKEN.title: YNAB Personal Access Token
YNAB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your YNAB Personal Access Token. Generate one at: https://app.youneedabudget.com/settings/developer

YNAB_EXPORT_PATH.title: Export Directory Path
YNAB_EXPORT_PATH.description: Directory where exported transaction files will be saved. Leave empty for platform default: Windows/Mac use Downloads, Linux/Unix use Documents. Examples: ~/Desktop, C:\Users\YourName\Documents, /home/user/exports
